application.resources.gates

Class norController

  • java.lang.Object
    • application.resources.gates.gateObject
      • application.resources.gates.norController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.fxml.Initializable

    public class norController
extends gateObject
implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
    The norController class represents a NOR gate controller extending gateObject. It contains functionality specific to NOR gate behavior in a circuit simulation.
    Since:
    1.0

        Calls the checktype method on the given node.
        Parameters:
        node - the Rectangle node to call checktype on

      • checktype

        public void checktype()
        Checks the type of the NOR gate and updates its state accordingly. If at least one input is false, the output is true, otherwise false.
